Subject: Initial discovery call with Acme Corp
Body: Discussed current pain points with their CRM system. They are looking for better pipeline visibility and reporting.
Notes: Decision maker is the VP of Sales. Budget approved for Q1.

Subject: Proposal sent to TechStart Inc
Body: Sent the enterprise pricing proposal with custom integration options as discussed in our last meeting.
Notes: Included ROI calculator and case studies.

Subject: Product demo for GlobalTech Solutions
Body: Conducted a full product demonstration including dashboard, pipeline board, and reporting features.
Outcome: Very positive reception. Moving to negotiation phase.
Notes: CTO was impressed with the API integration capabilities.

Subject: Support inquiry from DataFlow Systems
Body: Customer called about integration issues with their existing ERP system.
Outcome: Created support ticket, escalated to engineering
Notes: High priority - affecting their daily operations.

Subject: Re: Contract renewal discussion
Body: Customer confirmed they want to proceed with the annual renewal at the proposed rate.
Notes: Send updated contract by end of week.

Subject: Lead qualification notes - NextGen Enterprises
Body: Reviewed the lead from the trade show. Company has 200+ employees, annual revenue $50M+. Good fit for enterprise tier.
Notes: Assign to senior sales rep for outreach.

Subject: Quarterly business review with CloudFirst
Body: Reviewed usage metrics, discussed expansion opportunities, and addressed minor concerns about reporting performance.
Outcome: Customer satisfied. Interested in adding 10 more seats.
Notes: Prepare expansion quote for next meeting.

Subject: Meeting reminder to InnovateTech
Body: Sent reminder for tomorrow's product demo at 2pm.

Subject: Contract negotiation with SmartBiz Corp
Body: Negotiated pricing and SLA terms. Customer requested 15% discount on 3-year commitment.
Notes: Legal team to review final contract terms.

Subject: Cold call to PrimeLogistics
Body: Initial outreach to discuss their logistics management challenges and how our CRM can help.
Outcome: Interested but not ready to buy. Asked for info packet.
Notes: Send case study for logistics industry.

Subject: Trade show booth visit - CRM Expo 2026
Body: Met with several prospects at the CRM Expo trade show booth. Collected 15 business cards.
Notes: Top prospects: HealthFirst Medical, GreenEnergy Solutions, UrbanDev Properties.

Subject: Onboarding welcome email to new customer
Body: Sent welcome package with getting started guide, training schedule, and support contacts.
Notes: Schedule first training session for next week.

Subject: Billing question from RetailMax
Body: Customer called about unexpected charge on their invoice. Explained it was the annual price adjustment per contract.

Subject: Pipeline review with sales team
Body: Internal meeting to review Q1 pipeline status, discuss stuck deals, and assign action items.
Outcome: Identified 3 at-risk deals requiring executive involvement
Notes: Schedule executive sponsor calls for top 3 deals.

Subject: Follow-up on product interest
Body: Following up on the demo from last week. Attached updated pricing and feature comparison sheet.
Notes: If no response by Friday, call directly.
